text: @ypp_peat @dartmoornpa @moorsforfuture @KatyThorpe12 @EnvAgencySW One of many names, I guess we more frequently call them fish-scale bunds in our planning/mapping. Contour bunds as they try to track contours on restoration sites to wet-up large cross-slope areas. We've done lots in various situations with varying levels success over the past yr

@RedbridgeBlue @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency @SoWoSociety Hi Paul, thank you for raising your concerns. Please use our online tools to report fly tipping https://t.co/U8ASGmmxhv as these reports go directly to our Enforcement Team who can track ongoing issues to take necessary action and investigate further if required. Thank you.

text:
@MetOffice_Sci @metoffice @beisgovuk @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency So why were 2010's cooler than the 2000's ?

Why was this Summer 0.25% cooler than the 81-2010 average ?

That is not extreme, the only thing that is,

is @metoffice bleating AGW crap.

Very disappointing to see the mismanagement of streams continuing by @EnvAgency themselves. I can imagine this scenario been artificially reproduced in the next few years in a bid to 're-naturalize' the channel, shipping in offsite materials and costing thousands. https://t.co/cfqdharQ0t
